hanzi-su-wiki:
現

Значения

Выявляться, обнаруживаться; выявлять, проявлять, выражать; действительность, факт; быть налицо, в наличии

Мнемоника

Видеть 見 драгоценность 王 собственными глазами, выявлять её достоинства и недостатки.

Варианты

现
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiàn
to appear; present; now; existing; current
появиться; настоящее время; сейчас же; существующий; Текущий
rtega_mnemonic:
現現RS
X		actual, appear, show, express
  • the king 王 is seen 見 during an audience in the intercalary month of the moon calendar; 潤
 表 示

現現RS

  • the king 王 is seen 見 by everyone in public: a manifest appearance

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 现)
Antonyms: 隱
Ideographic: To see 見 jade 王; 見 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
現在 [ xiàn zài ]: now; at present; at the moment; modern; current; nowadays
現代 [ xiàn dài ]: Hyundai, South Korean company
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
    • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
heisig_chinese_memo: The king ... can see clearly the present state of affairs in the land. (maybe he hees them in the crystal ball on the left?).
heisig_constituent: present, king, jewel, ball, see, telescope, eye, human legs
heisig_story: Do not think of a "gift" here, but of the present moment, as distinct from the future and the past. The kanji gives us a ball in which we see the present - obviously a crystal ball that enables us to see things going on at the present in faraway places.
koohiiStory1: The KING ... can SEE clearly the PRESENT state of affairs in the land. (maybe he hees them in the crystal ball on the left?).
koohiiStory2: Hey, I want my money back! This crystal ball is out of order, I can see the present instead of the future!
kunYomi: あらわ.れる、あらわ.す、うつつ、うつ.つ
jp_example_words:
現われ(あらわれ): embodiment, materialization
現われる(あらわれる): to appear, to come in sight, to become visible, to come out, to embody, to materialize, to express oneself
現行(げんこう): present, current, in operation
現場(げんじょう): actual spot, scene, scene of the crime
現像(げんぞう): developing (film)
現地(げんち): actual place, local
再現(さいげん): reappearance, reproduction, return, revival
現す(あらわす): indicate, show, display
現れ(あらわれ): embodiment
現れる(あらわれる): appear, embody, express oneself
現金(げんきん): cash, ready money, mercenary, self-interested
現在(げんざい): present, up to now, nowadays, modern times, current
現実(げんじつ): reality
現象(げんしょう): phenomenon
現状(げんじょう): present condition, existing state, status quo
現代(げんだい): nowadays, modern times, present-day
現に(げんに): actually, really
現場(げんば): actual spot, scene, scene of the crime
実現(じつげん): implementation, materialization, realization
表現(ひょうげん): expression, presentation, (mathematics) representation
jp_readingExamples: 現す (あらわ.す), 現れる (あらわ.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The king can see the present time for what it really is. The future isn't important. The past isn't important. The present is where it's at.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: People are constantly asking the king to do things for them and solve their problems. But the king can see exactly what needs to be done at the present time, and what can wait until tomorrow.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: At the present time the king is Genji (げん). The time has finally come for him to get serious, and as they say, there's no time like the present.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture pretty Genji, carefully instructing his followers what to do at the present time and what can wait.
Ru_trainchinese:
xiàn: (графема) нынешний, текущий; доступный прямо сейчас; наличные деньги, наличность
xiàn: (глаг) появляться, показываться, обнаруживаться
xiàn: (нареч) с ходу, экспромтом
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the king (王) you see (見) is present
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The king uses magic to see everything in the present.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " king ", " seeing " sound, the original meaning is revealing. Jin Gehong's "Baopuzi-Zhili": "(Shanjing) may appear to come and go, or hear its voice and words."

" Now " can mean now. Emperor Liang Wu of the Southern Dynasties "Rising a God and Becoming a Buddha": "Thanks to the good and evil, it is born in the present state."

" Now " also means immediately. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 28: "I can't do anything, so I have to show him two beads and flowers."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " king " and " seeing ", the original meaning is revealing.
humanum_full_description:
從「王」，「見」聲，本義為顯露。晉葛洪《抱樸子‧至理》：「（山精）或形現往來，或但聞其聲音言語。」

　　「現」可表示現在。南朝梁武帝〈立神明成佛義記〉：「善惡交謝，生乎現境。」

　　「現」還表示當即。《紅樓夢》第28回：「我沒法兒，只得把兩枝珠子花兒現拆了給他。」

③目前，當時：現時。現在。現今。現場。現代。現買現賣。

從「 王 」，「 見 」聲，本義為顯露。晉葛洪《抱樸子‧至理》：「（山精）或形現往來，或但聞其聲音言語。」 「 現 」可表示現在。南朝梁武帝〈立神明成佛義記〉：「善惡交謝，生乎現境。」 「 現 」還表示當即。《紅樓夢》第28回：「我沒法兒，只得把兩枝珠子花兒現拆了給他。」
From " king", " seeing" sound, the original meaning is revealing. Jin Gehong's "Baopuzi-Zhili": "(Shanjing) may appear to come and go, or hear its voice and words." " Now" can mean now. Emperor Liang Wu of the Southern Dynasties "Rising a God and Becoming a Buddha": "Thanks to the good and evil, it is born in the present state." " Now" also means immediately. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 28: "I can't do anything, so I have to show him two beads and flowers."

現字的基本解释

現
xiàn
见“现”。

現字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》胡甸切，去霰，匣。］
“现1”的繁体字。
(1)显露；出现。
(2)现在，眼前。
(3)眼前实有的；当时可以拿出的。参见“現境”、“現款”。
(4)当即；临时。
(5)特指现款。
(6)实现。

現字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　現； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页732第22
【集韻】【正韻】?形甸切，音見。【集韻】玉光。　又【正韻】顯也，露也。【抱朴子至理卷】或形現往來。　又【集韻】胡典切，音蜆。石之次玉者。

現字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guangyun" Hu Dian cut, go to chai, box. ]
The traditional characters of "now 1".
(1) Reveal; appear.
(2) Now, in front of you.
(3) There is something in front of you; it can be taken out at that time. See "live", "cash".
(4) Immediately; temporary.
(5) Specifically refers to cash.
(6) Realization.
Present
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　 Xian; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 732 22
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Shaped and cut, see the sound. [Ji Yun] Yuguang.　[Zhengyun] Xian Ye, Lu Ye. [Baopuzi Zhilijuan] Or form and exchange.　[Jiyun] Hu Dianqie, sound clam. Stone is second to jade.

xiàn
вм. 现
Radicals: 王, 見  (king, see)
Meaning Mnemonic
The king can see the present time for what it really is. The future isn't important. The past isn't important. The present is where it's at.
People are constantly asking the king to do things for them and solve their problems. But the king can see exactly what needs to be done at the present time, and what can wait until tomorrow.
Reading Mnemonic
At the present time the king is Genji (げん). The time has finally come for him to get serious, and as they say, there's no time like the present.
Picture pretty Genji, carefully instructing his followers what to do at the present time and what can wait.
